title: Prototype for Research Paper
text: I implemented a React frontend for an AI research project that ended up getting published in the journal Artificial Intelligence and Law. I am a co-author on the publication.

title: Website for a Local Small Business
text: Several years ago I made my first real website for a local small business. Comparing it to some of my more recent projects, it's cool to see how far I've come in my ability to design.

title: College Database Class Website
text: I wrote the backend API for interacting with the database used in this project for a college databases class. Databases is one of the classes I still find myself using day to day.
